of context
state but state has weight all of this

always a
butt these systems have an awful lot of

that stateless is

native so let's not forget that
Kubernetes already provides very strong
primitives for us to manage

which provides durable storage we've got

for pots and we also have demons set

application and

to evolve because we are already dealing

synchronization and performance

so we can leverage Numa aware AI

we also have LLM gateway that will

consuming large language model that we

challenge we have is we need a fully new
model for fall tolerant management why
is
that ai agents don't fail in a
traditional way they may fail by
producing a wrong output and we need to
be able to recover from this type of

forward we are going to have to deal
